channel.title: CVE Feed for Code Supply Co. -- Absolute Reviews
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Code Supply Co. -- Absolute Reviews

item.title: CVE-2024-8965|2024-09-27T15:22:08.613Z -- code%20supply%20co. -- absolute%20reviews
item.description: The Absolute Reviews plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'Name' field of a custom post criteria in all versions up to, and including, 1.1.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
